com.facebook.litho.sections.widget

Class ListRecyclerConfiguration<T extends SectionTree.Target & Binder<RecyclerView>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.facebook.litho.sections.widget.ListRecyclerConfiguration<T>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    RecyclerConfiguration

    public class ListRecyclerConfiguration<T extends SectionTree.Target & Binder<RecyclerView>>
extends Object
implements RecyclerConfiguration
    A configuration object for RecyclerCollectionComponent that will create a androidx.recyclerview.widget.LinearLayoutManager for the RecyclerView.
